title: Colors and Psychic Auras - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/24/17
itunes:title: Colors and Psychic Auras - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/24/17
description:
George Noory and guest Dougall Fraser discuss the colors of our psychic auras, and how they can be used to improve specific aspects of your life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
